meaningMnemonic: You come across an <radical>angel</radical> wearing a <radical>hat</radical> that's covered in <radical>flowers</radical>. So, you do the only natural thing. You take this angel, chop him up into tiny pieces, and dry him out. Then, you make <kanji>tea</kanji> out of all the dried up angel bits. You wear the hat, though.
readingMnemonic: In your <kanji>tea</kanji> you find a little metal button. I guess you missed it while you turned the angel into tea. You look at the button - on the back it says "To <reading>Cha</reading>d (ちゃ), you'll make an awesome angel." Looks like you're drinking Chad the Angel.
